name: Turn Out the Lights
description:
You've been in space for a while, working for The Company at mining asteroids. But the program you were a part of has been shut down, and now it's time to come home. Can you?

This is a short, atmospheric text adventure that features original music and dialogue. (The mood has been described as "space-emo" by at least one player.)

Gameplay: point-and-click through text choices.

Features: Multiple endings, original music, voiced dialogue, and original foley sound work.

It should take about 15-20 minute to complete a playthrough.
